author: Flecks Francis
text: EARTHQUAKE!!!!!

author: Flecks Francis
text: "I know the plans I have for you,” declares the Lord, “plans for good and not to harm you, to give you a future and a hope."  Jeremiah 29:11

author: Flecks Francis
text: God’s children do not make a practice of sinning, for God’s Son holds them securely and the evil one cannot touch them.  1 John 5:18 NLT

author: Flecks Francis
text: Now God is shining in our hearts to let you know that His glory is seen in Jesus Christ. 2 Corinthians 4:6b CEV

author: Flecks Francis
text: We declare the secret and hidden wisdom of God.  None of the rulers understood it; if they had they would not have crucified the Lord of glory.  1 Corinthians 2:7-8

author: Flecks Francis
text:
For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ, for it is the power of God to salvation for everyone who believes, for the Jew first and also for the Greek.
Romans 1:16

author: Flecks Francis
text:
I hope today is a good day for you. I hope someone you love gives you a big hug when you need it the most
I hope that you will rise out of your bed knowing you are  strong, you are worthy & you can accomplish whatever you need to do today
  Be kind in your struggle & healing

author: Flecks Francis
text: 7 Things I tell myself every morning: 1. You’re not as smart as you think you are 2. No one is coming to save you 3. You’re going to die some day 4. No one is perfect, so stop tying to be 5. Love your family—they will die 6. How you feel is a choice 7. Don’t imitate—be yourself

author: Flecks Francis
text: If your energy drops around certain people or things, that's a sign from the universe to distance yourself.

author: Flecks Francis
text: There were shepherds out in the field... An angel of the Lord appeared to them and the glory of the Lord shone around them. Luke 2:8-9

author: Flecks Francis
text:
But He was wounded for our transgressions,
He was bruised for our iniquities;
The chastisement for our peace was upon Him,
And by His stripes we are healed.
Isaiah 53:5

author: Flecks Francis
text:
“And behold, I am coming quickly, and My reward is with Me, to give to every one according to his work. I am the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End, the First and the Last.”
Revelation 22:12-13

author: Flecks Francis
text:
In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him. 
1 John 4:9

author: Flecks Francis
text:
Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights, who does not change like shifting shadows. 
James 1:17

author: Flecks Francis
text:
Confuncius says…

Man who like 69, always sticking his nose where it may not be wanted.

author: Flecks Francis
text: “Appreciate this moment. When you do, your future will be full of magnificent moments.”

author: Flecks Francis
text: Your life will change if you write 100 things you are grateful for. Do it today. FEEL the gratitude. Your power is in the FEELING.

author: Flecks Francis
text:
Yo Momma is so ugly...

Her birth certificate is letter of apology from the condom factory!

author: Flecks Francis
text:
A little girl was told off for wetting herself in class.

"Why didn't you put your hand up", asked the teacher?

"I did, but it kept running out."

author: Flecks Francis
text: #Scorpio trusts no one but themselves.

author: Flecks Francis
text: Jesus said: no one can come to Me unless the Father who sent me draws them to Me, and at the last day I will raise them up.  John 6:44 NLT

author: Flecks Francis
text: He who supplies seed to the sower ... will supply and multiply your seed and increase the harvest of your righteousness.  2 Corinthians 9:10

author: Flecks Francis
text: It would have been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness, than to have known it and then to turn their backs.  2 Peter 2:21

author: Flecks Francis
text: Through everything God made they can clearly see His invisible qualities—His eternal power and divine nature. So they have no excuse.  Romans 1:20 NLT

author: Flecks Francis
text: When I saw Him, I fell at His feet as though dead. But He laid His right hand on me, saying, “Fear not, I am the first and the last." Revelation 1:17 ESV

author: Flecks Francis
text: Only the redeemed... will enter Zion with singing; gladness and joy will overtake them and sorrow and sighing will flee.  Isaiah 35:9 10 (abbreviated)

author: Flecks Francis
text: Don't wait until your life becomes unbearable, to make changes. Start today. Start small if you have to. Just move forward.

author: Flecks Francis
text:
The guy who stole my diary died...

My thoughts are with his family.

author: Flecks Francis
text:
The fact that there is a highway to hell and only a stairway to heaven says a lot...

A lot about the anticipated traffic numbers.
